title: Language Leadership Education Design Using [Self-Directed] Reusable E-Learning Objects (ELOs)

context.prior_knowledge: Corporate training operations experience and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Environment requiring customized content for corporate managers/leaders to improve language proficiency, enhancing educational efficiency through database-driven ELO (European Language Portfolio) management

learning_goals: Learners can search, select, and integrate language learning objects from the ELO database into the curriculum with 90% accuracy.
Learners can classify ELOs using tags and combine them into reusable structures five or more times to create job-specific content packages.
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of ELO-based learning modules with over 80% satisfaction through summative assessments and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
